channel.title: Interest Calculator :: Introduction to Python
channel.description: Calculating Compound Interest In the first programming homework assignment, we’ll create a simple program to help us calculate how much compound interest we can make over our lifetime by saving money in a retirement account. It’s a great way to see the value of saving early and often, as it pays substantial dividends later on!
